posts.post_content:
I interested in buying T206 Sovereign 460's.  Graded or RAW.  Graded 1 or 2.  I only own two, so I bet you have one's that I don't.

Open to trading as well:  I have 10 Sov. 150's/350's and 60 other graded T206.  1 and 2's.  I also have twenty ungraded cards.  I will send scans if interested.

Here's what I have for sale or trade:

Zach
